short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark your favorite site and quickly view it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you bookmark your favorite websites instantly along with features like edit and delete. With a simplistic and minimalistic look it still gives you the instant performance. Hope you all enjoy it!
